----- Original Message -----
From: "Su" <suceress@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, June 20, 2003 2:34 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Everquest: Lost Dungeons of Norrath


> Good question. I'm not sure how it is going to work. It may just be a
> feature in the new dungeons. I would think that while it may prevent KSing
> it might also prohibit people from interacting as much and stop people
from
> being rescued by passersby. It will probably require alot more memory on
the
> servers too. I hope they know what they're doing.
> luv,
> -Su
>
> > I dunno about the space thing, how are they going to implemen it?
> >
> >
> > >From: Su <suceress@...>
> > >Reply-To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> > >To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> > >Subject: [EverQuest] Everquest: Lost Dungeons of Norrath
> > >Date: Wed, 18 Jun 2003 17:31:43 -0500
> > >
> > >So, another expansion pack is coming out. The features listed look
pretty
> > >cool.
> > >I'll be interested to see how they are implemented and how they work in
> the
> > >game.
> > >Anyone else looked at the webpage and have any thoughts on this?
> > >I love the idea of being able to unlock, open, or bash open chests and
> > >such.
> > >That is something I feel was missing from this game. And the private
> space
> > >sounds good too.
> > >Thoughts?
> > >luv,
> > >-Su
> > >
